well after the The legend of korra ends which is soon.

Are you really bugged by a logo? Like, get over yourself. This guy's uploading them quickly. If a tv channel's logo bugs you so much, go buy the DVD's. Thanks Daman, love the torrents!

Thank you for your dedication Daman4life, even with the slight hiccup you still got a fixed version out even if it was extra work for you.

To the person complaining about the logo, seriously? The show is still airing, just be happy you got such a high quality 720p version at such a small size.
I'm not complaining to Daman. I only asking me why the 2 last chapters without logo were in 960x720, but the other 6 were in normal 1280x720 format.
